purpose: To make websites accessible for AI agents, allowing them to automate tasks online.
principle: Built on top of Playwright, it uses browser automation techniques to perform web interactions programmatically.
reusability: Offers a Python API that can be integrated into other projects to automate web tasks, with support for various browsers.
limitations: Limited to web-based automation; requires a running browser environment and may face issues with websites using anti-bot measures.
name: browser-use
description: üåê Make websites accessible for AI agents. Automate tasks online with ease.
highlight: Enables AI agents to interact with web pages like a human, automating online tasks seamlessly.
